QuestData.Title: Target: Hive'Zora Reavers
QuestData.Description: Reinforcements have been called on to join the assault on Hive'Zora. You have been selected to target Hive'Zora reavers. Report back to Commander Mar'alith after completing your task.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay 30 Hive'Zora Reavers and report back to Commander Mar'alith at Cenarion Hold in Silithus. You must also bring Combat Task Briefing IV in order to complete this quest.
QuestData.CompletionText: You have something to tell me, $C?
QuestData.RewardText: I've heard good things about your part in the Hive'Zora attack. Keep up the good work and victory will soon be ours.
